metadata.name: LOL-Binary Copied From System Directory
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious copy operation that tries to copy a known LOLBIN from system (System32, SysWOW64, WinSxS) directories to another on disk in order to bypass detections based on locations.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\cmd.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('copy ')) OR (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('copy-item')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' copy ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cpi ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' cp '))) OR (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\robocopy.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\xcopy.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('robocopy\\.exe', 'xcopy\\.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\system32')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\syswow64')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\winsxs'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\bitsadmin.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\calc.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\certutil.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\cmdl32.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\cscript.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\mshta.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\rundll32.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\wscript.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious copy operation that tries to copy a known LOLBIN from system (System32, SysWOW64, WinSxS) directories to another on disk in order to bypass detections based on locations.
